wordGroup: shale shaker 振动筛；泥浆振动筛
carbonaceous shale 碳质页岩；炭质页岩

sentences.en: We must find economical methods for extracting oil from shale.
sentences.cn: 我们必须找到从页岩中采油的经济方法。

sentences.en: The Burgess Shale formation also has fossils of many extinct representatives of modern animal groups.
sentences.cn: 伯吉斯页岩地层中也有许多代表着现代动物群中已经灭绝的物种的化石。

sentences.en: Fossil formations like the Burgess Shale show that evolution cannot always be thought of as a slow progression.
sentences.cn: 像波基斯页岩这样的化石层表明进化不应该总被看作是一个缓慢的过程。
